dialogue.text: *<audio>Title eroded to the point of being unreadable*</audio>
"Our love <speed=0.2>shall be</speed> remembered, <speed=0.5>carved into this stone to erode</speed> as we age together"
"Let this be a seal for our devotion to one another, to delve into our continued search for happiness in a world hostile to once like us"
"In times of hardship, this stone will stand unbothered..."
